task.title: Setting up the telestion-client development environment
task.shortdesc: The steps necessary to contribute to any packages in the repository.

taskbody.prereq: Ensure that you have node, npm, git and lerna installed on your machine.

context.p: To develop modules, you'll need to clone the project and then setup its dependencies.

step.cmd: Run git clone git@github.com:TelestionTeam/telestion-client.git in your command line
step.stepresult: This clones the repository to the telestion-client folder.
step.steptroubleshooting: If an error message regarding missing authentication/authority to clone the repository appears, make sure that you have added your public SSH key to GitHub ( Settings SSH and GPG Keys SSH Keys )

step.stepresult: You've now entered the telestion-client folder with your command line

step.info: This runs lerna bootstrap --hoist in the background.
step.stepresult: All dependencies get installed and linked automatically.

taskbody.result: Your development environment is now completely set up and ready to go. Thank you so much in advance for your contributions ;)
